title: Katarina should not gain magic resist per level
body: Wayy to op burst should not have any sustain. please make her more squishy possibly remove scaling magic resist from all assassins.

replies.body: Bro, she basically had her health growth and regen halved last patch. How squishy do you want her? Just hard cc her for .5 seconds and she is basically screwed. Especially if you cancelled her ult.
They can just increase her health a bit again
So you don't want her to be squishy per say, just more vulnerable to magic damage?
how about instead of buying 5 deathcaps and a ludens, buy some Mr so you don't get insta-gibbed by an assassin who's job it is to assasinate and deal high burst damage.
Yeh her role is not to be tanky just go in do damage.

1.25 mr per lvl does not make katerina tanky in any way. All it does is makes going to melee range bearable without getting instagibbed, most mid laners are ranged and can poke constantly with auto attacks. q e w does laughable damage early for it's high risk and leaves her vulnerable. Q alone does not do that much damage unless she's targeting you directly and if kat is, you can easily counterattack with  1 or 2 spells and an auto attack.
they also nerfed her base hp pool a few patches ago and her ult cooldown and damage before that
Yet she is melee, hence why she has scaling MR.

Sorry friendo but tank assassins who can shrug off poke with magic resist per level shouldn't be a thing.
Free poke with bouncing blades, and doesn't rely on auto attacks just death lotus, and shunpo in and out.
